teams.name: BODALA
teams.loan_because: We truly believe microloans offer a real economic-based solution to gradually end worldwide poverty. Everybody deserves access to financing - it is a basic need of all people in today's world.  However, the people who need it most in this world are being excluded. Most living here in the United States has much more than what they need. We can all spare a few dollars for a LOAN which will empower a poor person to effectively and responsibly counter the harsh realities of poverty by starting or expanding their own small business. Giving a loan without interest to a stranger across the world is definitely a charitable act - but this is not about charity with no end in sight.  Microloans are about empowering others who want to work for their survival but are less fortunate. Since commercial banks regard the poor as non-"creditworthy", it us up to us as compassionate individuals to do our part to help!
teams.description: Ordinary people being sensible and trying to do the right thing.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: We for Humanity
teams.loan_because: We as a people care for our fellow human beings.
teams.description: We do not adhere to  the social constructs that we as a human race have developed in order to categorize each other.  If you are a person in need; your spiritual beliefs, geographical location, age, gender,  and political association is of no interest to us.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Jonkel
teams.loan_because: we care.

teams.name: Ireland
teams.loan_because: Small streams become mighty rivers.
teams.description: A group of Kiva Lenders from Ireland, or with links to Ireland. Feel free to join our community :)

teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: Dominican University
teams.loan_because: We believe in sustainable business and in the human spirit.
teams.description: We are the students, alumni, faculty, staff, friends and community of Dominican University in River Forest, Illinois, a suburb of Chicago. We work together with Dominican University's Brennan School of Business, Center for Global Peace through Commerce, and Net Impact student group.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: United World Colleges
teams.description: United World Colleges (UWC) is unique. It is the only global educational movement that brings together students from all over the world – selected on personal merit, irrespective of race, religion, politics and the ability to pay – with the explicit aim of fostering peace and international understanding.

"If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." - Dalai Lama

We are a group of generous, warm and benevolent individuals from all over the world, tackling poverty in Pakistan one loan at a time.

teams.name: Team Pakistan
teams.loan_because: we want to share what we have with those less fortunate
teams.description: Believe that everyone should should have an opportunity to improve their lives

teams.name: Three Cups of Tea - CAI Supporters
teams.loan_because: we have been touched, moved, inspired, and motivated by the example of Greg Mortenson, humanitarian, peace-maker, and author of "Three Cups of Tea: One Man's Mission To Promote Peace... One School At A Time."  Please read it if you have not already done so: your life will be changed.  We also support the Central Asia Institute (CAI), and Pennies For Peace (www.penniesforpeace.org)
teams.description: We lend especially to women in Pakistan and Afghanistan, where Mortenson and CAI are active in establishing community schools in rural areas.

teams.name: Scotland
teams.loan_because: Scotland has always been a place where inventors have prospered and philanthropy has flourished. This is a chance to show that Scots do care and can make a difference in the world.
teams.description: It's a team for anyone who has links to Scotland, either through birth, marriage or simply location.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia.

teams.name: Phi Mu Fraternity
teams.loan_because: The first line of our creed is "To lend to those less fortunate a helping hand."
teams.description: Phi Mu was founded in 1852 at Wesleyan College in Macon, Georgia and is the second oldest sorority in the nation. We have provided social opportunities, a support network, and personal enrichment resources to members for over 150 years.

teams.loan_because:

http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Lufthansa
teams.loan_because: Every day we help 209.500 people all over the world to reach their goals. So we just do what we know how to do best lending people a hand to reach their goal.
teams.description: Deutsche Lufthansa AG is a global aviation group. The Group operates in five business segments, each dedicated to high quality standards. The five units – the passenger airline business, logistics, MRO, catering and IT services – all play a leading role in the industry in which they operate. The Lufthansa Group includes a total of more than 400 subsidiaries and associated companies. Foremost at Lufthansa are such attributes as quality and innovation, safety and reliability. We are well positioned strategically, operationally and financially to negotiate ups-and-downs in the economy. Our corporate strategy is geared to sustainable value creation and is expressed in our commitment to shareholder value. We attach priority to profitability over size.

teams.name: Intuit
teams.loan_because: Intuit is honored to dedicate the efforts of our Kiva lending team to the memory of our friend and colleague Anne Henderson. Anne passed away in September 2010 after a long battle with cancer. She was a bright light to everyone around her and was passionate about helping entrepreneurs through Kiva. We are inspired by her compassion, and are honored to continue her efforts to alleviate poverty. Anne, you will be greatly missed.
teams.description: At Intuit, corporate social responsibility is more than just a business practice, it's a longstanding part of who we are. It's our culture. It's one of our core values: We Care & Give Back. Anyone may join and invite others to join the Intuit lending team.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: ∞ Braincrave ∞
teams.loan_because: We believe the children are our future.  Teach them well and let them lead the way.  Show them all the beauty we possess inside.  You've got to give them a sense of pride.  To make it easier - let the children's laughter remind us how we used to be.
teams.description: We are the alpha and omega of all things Kiva.

teams.name: SwapTrust Botswana
teams.loan_because: We want to help other women "be the change they want to see"
teams.description: A New Civil Society organisation in Botswana working to improve Access to improved Sanitation and Water.

teams.name: In Memory of Paul Lambert
teams.loan_because: We all want to remember Paul.
teams.description: Paul was a Volunteer Coordinator at Kiva.  He spoke four languages (English, French, Spanish and Russian).  He touched the lives of many through his work and the hearts of countless through his friendship.  We all miss him.

teams.name: VWC Corp.
teams.loan_because: We can.

teams.name: The Giving Tree
teams.loan_because:
We want to give people a chance to become self-sufficient and live an honourable life.

We believe that a hand up is better than a hand out, and that it needs to be both transparent and accountable.

We believe that planting many seeds of uplift in small and meaningful ways helps people become self-sustaining and strengthens both the economic and social fabric of communities. Micro-lending is the most direct and personal form of uplift and has the capacity for constant renewal.
teams.description:
We began as a group of friends and allies from the Second Life online community who came together through a joint online project called "The Giving Tree," a project that allowed us to work together to give back to people in first life communities.

This team and project continues on outside of Second Life in ways that allow us to expand our uplift.

All are welcome to join : )

teams.name: University of San Diego, School of Leadership and Education Sciences
teams.loan_because: We believe that we share this world, and we want to be worthy partners.
teams.description: Graduate and undergraduate students, faculty and staff at America's only school of LEADERSHIP AND EDUCATION sciences.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Bothell United Methodist Church
teams.loan_because: We are called to serve.
teams.description: A church that provides opportunity for persons of all ages to become actively involved in ministry and spiritual growth.

teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

teams.name: The Vanguard Scholarship
teams.loan_because: Mr. Green Ink would not accept a gift for himself and is always finding new ways to help others.  To show how much we've learned, we're giving in his honor; much like him, these loans will keep giving and bring smiles to the faces of those that need help.
teams.description: We are a group of unique employees whose career focus is helping our community.  Even though we are sad to see one of our own leave, we know we can use this opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others.

teams.name: Kiva U Schools
teams.whereabouts: High Schools Across the United States

teams.name: BLS Microloan Club
teams.loan_because: we believe in the ability of micro-finance to help low-income entrepreneurs pull themselves out of poverty.
teams.description: Eager to participate in the the growing system of micro-finance, we are a big group of students and alumni from Boston Latin School.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Creighton University School of Medicine
teams.loan_because: We, the students of Creighton University School of Medicine, strive to be men and women for and with others. We seek to capture the spirit of service, as illustrated through the core of Jesuit values, and further transcend the notion of service limited to our local community or constrained by physical reach. Through our intervention we will empower those who lack the resources to do so themselves and, in doing so, foster a lifelong commitment to service as well as pay forward the opportunities we were blessed with. A.M.D.G, ad majorem Dei gloriam, or “towards the greater glory of God” guides us to areas of need without discretion to race, culture, or creed. This is our purpose.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: A&M Campus Kiva
teams.whereabouts: Texas A&M University, College Station, Texas, U.S.A
teams.loan_because: We as Aggies feel a responsibility towards the less fortunate inhabitants of our planet.
teams.description: This team provides a means for Aggies (students, staff, faculty and affiliates past and current of Texas A&M University) to contribute to social progress.

teams.name: Virginia Tech
teams.loan_because: "Ut Prosim" - That I May Serve.  This is the motto of the university, and it is something that students/alumni come to understand as a dedication to service--a duty to think beyond oneself.  Kiva is a way that we show we're truly "Hokie Proud."
teams.description: Founded in 1872 as a land-grant college named Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College, Virginia Tech is now a comprehensive, innovative research university with the largest full-time student population in Virginia.  The Kiva team is made up of students, faculty, alumni, and fans of this great school!

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:

teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Cthulhu Fhtagn
teams.loan_because: Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn
teams.description: "the secret priests would take great Cthulhu from his tomb to revive His subjects and resume his rule of earth....Then mankind would have become as the Great Old Ones; free and wild and beyond good and evil, with laws and morals thrown aside and all men shouting and killing and revelling in joy. Then the liberated Old Ones would teach them new ways to shout and kill and revel and enjoy themselves, and all the earth would flame with a holocaust of ecstasy and freedom."

teams.name: Team WeAreOne
teams.loan_because: We are one.
teams.description: We illuminate the world with the light of charity.

teams.name: CSU Women's Clinic
teams.loan_because: We like the idea of Women helping Women.
teams.description: We provide women's health care to college students.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Filipino Americans for Economic Development
teams.loan_because: We are grateful for the sacrifices made by our loved ones to ensure that we Filipino Americans are given the privilege to take advantage of the American Dream. It is our responsibility to give back to our respective communities in the Philippines and to help develop the economic infrastructure currently being built back home.
teams.description: We are Filipino Americans sharing the opportunities given to us to those in the Philippines

teams.name: Hillside Missions
teams.loan_because: God has given to us and He has asked us to give to others.
teams.description: A group of Christians who care and want to share.

teams.name: Hillside Missions
teams.loan_because: God has given to us and He has asked us to give to others.
teams.description: A group of Christians who care and want to share.

teams.name: Albuquerque CSL
teams.loan_because: We believe that we need to take care of each other on the planet and that no one should suffer from lack. Hunger and suffering and dying because of poverty. "It doesn't have to be that way."
teams.description: We are a community of oprimistic, caring people who are happy to join the millions of you across the world making loans to help people lift themselves up from poverty to form a huge, powerful community and therefore a world movement to end poverty, fueled by caring and knowing we make a difference.

teams.name: Colbert Nation
teams.loan_because: I am helping my fellow wealthy American friends lighten their swollen pockets to help the rest of the world prosper.
teams.description: Stephen Colbert is the host and executive producer of the Emmy-nominated series on Comedy Central, "The Colbert Report." Touted by the New York Times as "one of the best television shows of the year" and praised as "a must-watch show" by Entertainment Weekly, "The Colbert Report" has garnered ratings and critical success as one of the top shows on television.
